The wind in our hair and the sand in our toes and the fish will always come and the bills will pay themselves and we'll have three big fat rosy kids and

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: No, I was just like you. I thought it was going to be all peaches and roses and everything great. And the wind in our hair and the sand in our toes, and the fish will always come and the bills will pay themselves, and we'll have three big fat rosy kids. And oh God.
